name: Garlic Chicken, Vegetable and Rice Skillet
author: Campbell's Kitchen
summary: You've got everything you need in just one-skillet . . . garlic-seasoned chicken breasts on a bed of rice mixed with colorful vegetables.  Getting dinner on the table couldn't be easier . . . and it tastes great too.
ingredients: 1 ¼ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
1 ¾ cups Swanson® Chicken Broth or Swanson® Chicken Stock
1 (16 ounce) package frozen vegetable combination (broccoli, cauliflower, carrots)
directions: Spray a 12-inch skillet with the cooking spray and heat over medium-high heat for 1 minute
Add the chicken and garlic and cook for 10 minutes or until the chicken is well browned on both sides
Remove the chicken from the skillet
Stir the broth, rice and vegetables in the skillet and heat to a boil
Return the chicken to the skillet
Sprinkle the chicken with the paprika
Cover and cook for 10 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the rice is tender
